author: Robert
title: Comment on Twitter Reacts to Remy Ma Dissing Nicki Minaj by Robert
text:
Get The Top 5 News Stories Each Day in Your InBox 
We will never share your email address.   Twitter Reacts to Remy Ma Dissing Nicki Minaj Published Updated 4:49 pm EST, February 28, 2017 1 Comment By Danilo Castro 13.1k 
Remy Ma has declared verbal war on Nicki Minaj . 
The NYC rapper, who just released her joint album with Fat Joe, Plata O Plomo , has now dropped a new track called â€œShetherâ€ where she aggressively attacks Minajâ€™s status as the queen of hip-hop. 
The title and beat is a nod to â€œ Ether ,â€ the classic Nas song that dissed Jay-Z in 2001, and Remy Ma takes a similarly brutal approach here. â€œYou stole that line about b*tches being your sons/How you take my â€™09 jail tweet and run,â€ she raps, before going on to mock with the line, â€œTalkinâ€™ â€˜bout bringing knives to a fight with guns/When the only shot you ever took was in your buns.â€ Remy Ma also claims that Hot 97 radio host Ebro slept with Nicki Minaj, and proceeds to borrows a snippet from BeyoncÃ©â€™s cover of â€œ Darling Nikki ,â€ where the pop star sings â€œI met a girl named Nicki/I guess you can say she was a rap queen.â€ 
Minaj response to the record has been erratic and angry, taking to social media to criticize Remy Maâ€™s album sales and her relevancy in rap (or lack thereof), before hopping on a live feed for a few seconds without directly addressing the diss: I was on for less than 15 seconds and 69K ppl watched. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜©ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜© https://t.co/xq7LYiwWpA 
â€” NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 25, 2017 
Not surprisingly, Twitter fans flocked to the news, and offered their thoughts on Remy Maâ€™s scathing takedown of Minaj. The general consensus? Minaj got bodied. the four stages of listening to remy ma ether nicki minaj #shether #NickiMinaj #remyma pic.twitter.com/7nXVPFD6RB 
â€” Quay pruitt (@Threwtalkin) February 25, 2017 Nicki listening to remy diss like pic.twitter.com/WkVFGd0VRN
